docs.text: RingCentral for Redtail CRM The RingCentral for Redtail CRM plugin for Chrome enhances Redtail with the following features: Dial any Redtail CRM contact instantly with the click of a button Sync your RingCentral and Redtail CRM contacts Be notified of inbound calls via an alert Display detailed information about inbound callers Easily attach call notes to your Redtail CRM contact activity log See it in action Install Now »
docs.title: Home

docs.text: The RingCentral for Redtail CRM plugin for Chrome enhances Redtail with the following features: Dial any Redtail CRM contact instantly with the click of a button Sync your RingCentral and Redtail CRM contacts Be notified of inbound calls via an alert Display detailed information about inbound callers Easily attach call notes to your Redtail CRM contact activity log

docs.text: About RingCentral for Redtail CRM Acknowledgements The RingCentral Embeddable Voice extension for Redtail CRM was created using Embbnux Ji 's tuturial: Building Chrome Extension Integrations with RingCentral Embeddable which walks you through the process of building a Chrome Extension and embedding RingCentral's phone into web pages. docs.text: Customizing RingCentral for Redtail CRM Developers are free to customize their RingCentral integration with Redtail CRM by forking the project on github: git clone https://github.com/ringcentral/redtail-embeddable-ringcentral-phone.git cd redtail-embeddable-ringcentral-phone npm i Create Your App On RingCentral you will need to create an application with your developer console. To create the app quickly, click the button below: Create RingCentral App Edit config.js You will need to create your config file using the template provided: cp config.sample.js config.js Look for the following section, and enter in your RingCentral Client ID, and set the server to the proper environment: //// ringcentral config ringCentralConfigs: { // your ringCentral app's Client ID // clientID: 'qypCMxxxxxxxivhrrGVeCrw', // your ringCentral app's Auth Server URL // appServer: 'https://platform.devtest.ringcentral.com' } , Start Up You are ready to start up your app. npm start Customize Your Integration To customize your integration, edit the many .js files in the src directory. As you edit, webpack will rebuild automatically. Install Your Extension Open your Chrome extension page . Turn on "Developer mode" in the upper right hand corner if it is turned off. Click "Load unpacked." Select the redtail-embeddable-ringcentral-phone/dist folder, and click "Select."
docs.title: Customization

docs.text: You are ready to start up your app. npm start
docs.title: Start Up

docs.text: To customize your integration, edit the many .js files in the src directory. As you edit, webpack will rebuild automatically.
docs.title: Customize Your Integration

docs.text: Open your Chrome extension page . Turn on "Developer mode" in the upper right hand corner if it is turned off. Click "Load unpacked." Select the redtail-embeddable-ringcentral-phone/dist folder, and click "Select."
docs.title: Install Your Extension

docs.text: Install RingCentral for Redtail CRM Chrome Download the latest zip file from the release page . Unzip the zip file. The contents will be unpacked into a dist folder. Open your Chrome extension page . Turn on "Developer mode" in the upper right hand corner if it is turned off. Click "Load unpacked." Select the dist folder, and click "Select." The extension is now installed.
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: Download the latest zip file from the release page . Unzip the zip file. The contents will be unpacked into a dist folder. Open your Chrome extension page . Turn on "Developer mode" in the upper right hand corner if it is turned off. Click "Load unpacked." Select the dist folder, and click "Select." The extension is now installed.
